item.description:
Singles, couples, Familes welcome!
Come to a vegan/vegetarian Valentines Day Brunch with the family! A suggested donation of $5 per adult (kids are free). And bring a vegetarian (vegan even more preferable) dish to share. There will be a kids area set up. Don't feel obligated to be right on time (but don't be over an hour late ; ) 
February 11th, 2012
11:00 am - 1:00 pm
24 Asqah Drive
North Kingstown, RI 02852

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Valentine's Potluck
